libkovan
Class Servo

java.lang.Object
  libkovan.Servo

public class Servo
extends java.lang.Object

In instance of this class is used to control a servo on a specified servo port. In addition it provides to static methods to disable and enable servo.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Markus Klein

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new servo on the specified port.

Constructor Detail

Servo

public Servo(int servoPort)
Creates a new servo on the specified port. The invocation Servo servo = new Servo(0) is equivalent to: Servo servo = new Servo(); servo.setPort(0);

Parameters:
sensorPort - the port of the sensor
